well issue with fiora is for example the other day i was top lane vs a fiora i picked {{champion:127}} a counter to fiora

i was up 2-0 in lane early. fiora from that point on went 25-10-12 and carried her team to a win. 

if she is able to get to full build and the game is stretched out long she is impossible to deal with.. 

i think her true damage needs to be nerfed a bit. 

but then again it could be cuz im an unranked scrub and the fiora was a plat 5 rank

who knows ?

I actually like facing {{champion:127}} and definitely wouldn't call her a counter, my playstyle involves guessing when the enemy will do something. Also {{champion:114}} scales really well.
She is in a REALLY balanced state right now, sitting at an average winrate of 49%

whether or not you call it a counter the two champs i have the best chances on vs {{champion:114}} is {{champion:127}} {{champion:54}} . and {{champion:127}} is a lane counter to her, all of {{champion:127}} abilities can kite and slow if not stop {{champion:114}} engages and poke her anytime she tries to cs. and as long as you get your ult off before fiora can "dodge" it so stupid. lol your ult can isolate and shut down a {{champion:114}} in any fight situation.

I play carries 90% of the time, tanks aren't exactly my thing. Although I love playing {{champion:78}} top every now and then
lol why Riven, don't get me wrong in the hands of a master like boxbox she's a nightmare, but as someone who played her 3 years straight I know that plenty of champs take a dump on her

well riven can be a pain in the ass . and there are some match ups that she gets dumpstered  on however she is another champ that can build full ad and gain def stats for doing so. like the scaling on her shield. i also think the keystones helps her too much with thunderlord decree as long as you are aware of the cooldown she can base her full combo around that and get the bonus damage from it. but keystones are another issue all together. but when i can no longer safely play a tank into a riven with out worrying about getting stomped in lane then she is  a bit over tuned. im not saying she needs a big turn down just maybe a slight nerf on her cds or a bit on her scaling.

i use to always play champs like {{champion:86}} or hell {{champion:57}} into her and may not win lane but stalemate her long enough she dont snowball and even with a tank like {{champion:57}} if you arent careful she will kill you early. and its over. only upside to playing {{champion:57}} into her is if you dont let her get out of hand that you scale better late game and once you reach lvl 11 mid game and have {{item:3027}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3110}} a combo of roa and one of those armor items you can purpose a threat.
When are we getting new information about the update? I'm dying to know more.
